page.title: 15Recreation in Ulverston
page.content: Facilities are available for many {sports}including swimming,squash, cricket,hockey,badminton,football, rugby league,tennis,putting,bowls and fishing. Other{recreations}enjoyed by many people include the Library,public houses,functions and exhibitions org- anised by the Renaissance Theatre Trust and Welfare State International, dramatic and musical societies. These facilities are well supported, with over 2,000 people attending the {swimming pool}each week. About half a small sample of local people say they visit public houses,half use the Library,and a third use the sports facilities. The average person watches 2 to 3 hours of television a day. It is generally agreed that there has been a great improvement in the town's sports facilities in the last 10 years.
